mapper.insert: insert into article ( article_title, article_content, article_url, article_from, article_author, status, update_time, create_time, is_original, is_valid ) values ( #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{articleUrl}, #{articleFrom}, #{articleAuthor}, #{status}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime}, #{isOriginal}, 0 )
mapper.select: select a.article_id,a.article_title,a.article_from,a.article_url,a.article_author,a.create_time, ak.kind_pinyin from article a left join article_kind_rel akr on a.article_id = akr.article_id left join article_kind ak on akr.article_kind_id = ak.article_kind_id where a.status =1 and akr.status=1 and ak.status = 1 order by rand() limit 0,#{amount}
select count(article_id) from article where status=1

select count(a.article_id) from article a left join article_kind_rel akr on a.article_id = akr.article_id left join article_kind ak on akr.article_kind_id = ak.article_kind_id where a.status =1 and akr.status=1 and ak.status = 1
and ak.kind_pinyin =#{kindPinyin}
select a.article_id,a.article_title,a.article_content,a.article_from,a.article_url,a.article_author,a.update_time,a.create_time,a.status,a.is_original from article a where a.article_id = #{articleId}

select count(a.article_id) from article a where a.status =1
and a.article_title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')

select count(article_id) from article_copy
article_title like concat('%', #{articleTitle}, '%') AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AND is_valid = 1

select a.article_id,a.article_title,a.article_content,a.article_from,a.article_url,a.article_author,a.update_time,a.create_time,a.status,a.is_original,a.is_valid from article_copy a where a.article_id = #{articleId}

select count(article_id) from article a left join article_label_rel alr on a.article_id = alr.article_id left join article_label al on alr.label_id = al.label_id where al.label.status = 1 and a.status =2 al.label_name like concat('%', #{labelName}, '%')

select a.article_id,a.article_title,a.article_content,a.article_from,a.article_url,a.article_author,a.update_time,a.create_time,a.status from article a left join article_label_rel alr on a.article_id = alr.article_id left join article_label al on alr.label_id = al.label_id where al.label.status = 1 and a.status =2 al.label_name like concat('%', #{labelName}, '%') order by create_time desc LIMIT #{startRow}, #{onePageSize}
